Alan

Subject: [nihontostudy] I may have asked this before ???? but.........



http://www.nihontomessageboard.com/tsuba_collection/soten-tadashige.jpg

http://www.nihontomessageboard.com/tsuba_collection/soten-tadashige-mei.jpg

http://www.nihontomessageboard.com/tsuba_collection/tadashige_mei_2.jpg

Any thought's on this ?, coming out of Japan late last year, it was
suggested this could be Soheishi Soten Tadashige. There is a definite
Tadashige in the mei. The colour is a rich dark black brown, it is
really quite heavy for it's size, ( large Wak ) and very dense.

I have not been able to place this piece at all.

Any thought's

Cheers

Rich
